scripts.debug: npm run lint && npm run clean:build && mkdir build && npm run static && npm run css && npm run js
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean:build && mkdir build && npm run static:min && npm run css:min && npm run js:min
scripts.static:min: npm run static && place build/index.html style.css style.min.css && place build/index.html main.js main.min.js
scripts.js:min: npm run js && terser build/main.js --compress --mangle --comments=false -o build/main.min.js
